article.title: General Atomics Supports MQ-9 Reaper
article.text: General Atomics Aeronautical Systems Inc., Poway, California, has been awarded a $57,401,850Â undefinitized contract action for MQ-9 contractor logistics support. Work will be performed at Poway, California and multiple overseas locations, and is expected to be complete by March 31, 2017. This contract is 100-percent foreign military sales to the United Kingdom. This award is the result of a sole-source acquisition. The Air Force Life Cycle Management Center, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, is the contracting activity (FA8620-15-G-4040 0017).
